summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the confirmation of stock positions for Southern Financial LLC. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, is following up on whether certain shares were received in a shell account. The email indicates communication between Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller about financial transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is following up on the status of stock positions for Southern Financial LLC.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is inquiring about the confirmation of stock shares received for Southern Financial LLC.

persons.name: Lisa
persons.context: Lisa is mentioned as someone Amanda Kirby reached out to regarding the stock positions.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller are communicating about financial transactions related to Southern Financial LLC.
Amanda Kirby reached out to Lisa for updates on the stock positions.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Harry Beller is following up on stock positions for Southern Financial LLC.
The email discusses the receipt of shares for two specific funds.
